attributes.action: I call upon the government to perform its duties in the following areas
attributes.additional_details:
I call upon the government to perform its duties in the following areas:
1. Fully fund the NHS
2. Stop the unwanted massively expensive HS2 project
3. Robustly police our borders
4. Strip citizenship from people known who fought for terrorists in other countries
5. Make it a crime to preach hate under the guise of religion
6. Prevent migrants from entering the country and deport those who can't speak the language, haven't a job, don't contribute,  flout our laws
7. Protect food animals from religious cruelty
